channel.title: Minecraft updated...... again
channel.description:
Notch:
* Implemented a new lighting engine with the help of MrMessiahs (can be turned off) * Changed the options around, added a new “Graphics options” button * Added beds. If all players in a map sleeps in a bed during night, the game immediately skips until morning * Added three new half-size blocks * Added Delay/Repeater redstone dust blocks * Added whitelisting to the server. To use, enter “whitelist ” where cmd is “on”, “off”, “add ”, “remove ”, “list” or “reload” * New save file format, old maps need to be converted (that might take a while..) * It’s now possible to have more than five save slots, and to rename saves * Scrollbars in both the texture pack list, and in the map selection screen * Replaced the Mojang splash image to reflect the new logo colors * .. and a bunch of bug fixes and tweaks!
There are a few pros and cons for this. First of all, the entire reason we are updating is to keep up with the latest launcher, so people that buy the game don't need to downgrade. This means we need to wait for Bukkit to update to 1.3 - a bit more waiting everyone, sorry. Good news is - these updates look great! Beds, repeater and delay blocks, new graphics options etc. Bad news is - File format changed.... AHHHHHH. We have two options. We can either start fresh with this new format (and in turn get all of the lapiz lazul generated) or we can convert. I'll put in a poll. Also - We will need a 1.3 cracked client, first one to find gets an e-cookie :)

Also, to Ranger

[quote=“ranger squad, post:35, topic:383527”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=479301.msg3509676#msg3509676 date=1298459429]

Reset.

You don’t deserve a vote
[/quote]

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suffrage[/quote]

Many countries restrict the voting rights of convicted criminals. Some countries, and some U.S. states, also deny the right to vote to those convicted of serious crimes after they are released from prison. In some cases (e.g. the felony disenfranchisement laws found in many U.S. states) the denial of the right to vote is automatic on a felony conviction

You commited a serious crime.

item.title: Minecraft updated...... again
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:56, topic:383527”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=479301.msg3510008#msg3510008 date=1298485729]
I thought after the first reset we said we would never reset again? Which is why I set up all the automatic backups and such just in case something bad happened.

@The people who want a reset, what is your reason? The new block shouldn’t be, it’ll be in new areas and we can edit it into existing ones easily. If you want a fresh area, we can always just move the spawn point someplace not yet explored. The new trees will grow on the existing land just fine. I just don’t see any legitimate reason to reset if ANYONE wants to keep the old map. Enlighten me?
[/quote]

your the owner make this a monarchy get rid of voting >:)[/quote]
this. lol. but really i took more than 2 weeks with 3 people working on it to get falador like 90% complete. well if it does get reset, ill only build a big place if there will not be a reset unless mandatory. how many of the voters actually actively play? plus i know 3 people not part of the forums but play the server that would vote against a reset. falador itself wasnt as hard as building my 2 monster spawning killing machine(which i get quite a lot of string, arrows, and feathers from). in the event it does reset let me know about the towns b/c ill probably be interested in joining one instead of building my own even though i would have less freedom.

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft updated...... again
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:55, topic:383527”][quote author=ranger squad link=topic=479301.msg3510017#msg3510017 date=1298486023]
I want a reset because I want the thrill of being able to explore again without having to go miles out of our way. I also want Creepers back, fire and TNT enabled, and a more “roleplay” theme to it (no undergound farms, raids that make sense instead of stacking dirt to scale walls, etc)
[/quote]and because you’re banned?[/quote]

Because I didn’t get unbanned, did I? (yes, I did.)

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft updated...... again
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:47, topic:383527”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=479301.msg3509971#msg3509971 date=1298483741]

o my fucking god u fucking pricks u could just build in new location assholes

They are assholes for wanting to take pictures of it, and not want to loose their work? I don’t care either way, but I have seen what others did and would like to see them keep it. I only lived in a save with a HUGE ass circle room that took me 3 hours to dig out, but that wasn’t hard at all. The castle’s I have seen are something I would take pictures of and try to rebuild as well if I had put work into them.

im sorry i dont want to lose my work u could just kill urself and lose everything and bam u started fresh

Yes, but some people want a complete change of scenery and a restart as a whole. WITHOUT having to go out of the way to do so.

theres plenty of servers out there
[/quote]

Well, not everybody wants to go on them. I think it’s fair that if the community wants a reset, they get a reset.[/quote]

well they idiots

Read full topic
